title: Vicious Mushroom
summaries: A Vicious Mushroom is a species of mushroom found on tainted grass in The Crimson, where they can be cut and collected with a single swing of any Weapon or Tool. They cannot be eaten or brewed into any potions, and are used solely to craft Vicious Powder.

Like other mushrooms, they can not be grown in a <linked>Clay Pot</linked> even with Crimson <linked>Grasses</linked>. Growing Vile Mushrooms will be converted into ordinary <linked>Mushrooms</linked> if they are purified using <linked>Purification Powder</linked> or the <linked>Clentaminator</linked>. Vicious Mushrooms can also be obtained by using Vicious Powder on <linked>Vile Mushrooms</linked>, and vice-versa.
